articles.title: Scott Bessent Suggests Government Bitcoin Purchases Remain a Possibility
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent announced Thursday that the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve would be made up of the $15 billion to $20 billion already held by the government. He also said that the government would explore budget-neutral pathways to acquire more Bitcoin to expand the reserve.

articles.title: U.S. Treasury Estimates Bitcoin Reserve Near $20B
articles.author: Crypto Economy

The administration will halt further Bitcoin sales and continue maintaining gold as a store of value. This move highlights growing institutional adoption of Bitcoin.

articles.title: Zand Partners With Mastercard to Expand Cross-Border Payment Services
articles.summary: Zand, an AI-powered financial services group in the UAE, has signed a strategic agreement with Mastercard to enhance its cross-border payment offerings. In the first phase, Zand will roll out services such as direct deposits into bank accounts, wallet top-ups in multiple markets and convenient cash pick-up options. The integration aims to simplify international transactions for both individuals and businesses.
